summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on March 25, 2011. The email contains a confidentiality notice and indicates that the information may be attorney-client privileged. It emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a personal communication with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a professional relationship.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley are engaged in a personal communication, indicating a social or professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
The communication is intended only for the use of Jes Staley.
Unauthorized use, disclosure, or copying of the email is prohibited.
